history.narrative: Law 1-99 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-300, which was referred to the Committee on Higher Education/University of the District of Columbia. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 27, 1976 and September 15, 1976, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 18, 1976, it was assigned Act No. 1-161 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
